summary: This appears to be an email forwarding a link to a trailer for a documentary titled 'Ghislaine - Partner In Crime' from Paramount, sent by an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office specializing in Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking. The document suggests ongoing FBI interest in media related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Ghislaine
persons.context: The subject of the documentary trailer 'Ghislaine - Partner In Crime' that is being shared in the email. The title suggests she is portrayed as a partner in crime, likely referring to her association with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Release of 'Ghislaine - Partner In Crime' trailer
events.description: A trailer for a documentary titled 'Ghislaine - Partner In Crime' is released by Paramount and shared via a Yahoo Entertainment link.

keyFacts: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit shared a link to a documentary trailer about Ghislaine Maxwell.
The documentary is titled 'Ghislaine - Partner In Crime', directly linking her to criminal activity with Jeffrey Epstein.
The email date is April 1, 2022, indicating continued official interest in the case years after Epstein's death and Maxwell's arrest.
The document is an internal email, showing FBI monitoring of public media related to their investigations.
The source is a Yahoo Entertainment link, suggesting the trailer was publicly available commercial media.
